## Description

Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Provide context for reviewers.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Tests
- [ ] Refactor

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project style and guidelines
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my change is effective or that this feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] No linting errors (`pnpm lint`)
- [ ] I have updated documentation where relevant
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my changes

## Review notes

- Provide anything the reviewer should pay attention to (breaking changes, migration steps, etc.)
